                                                                              # useState

                                                                              setState ä¼šè§¦å‘ç»„ä»¶çš„æ›´æ–°ã€‚å¹¶ä¸” setState æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœåœ¨æ‰§è¡Œ setState åç«‹å³è·å– stateï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¾ç„¶ä¼šå¾—åˆ°æ—§å€¼ã€‚æ‰€ä»¥åº”è¯¥åœ¨ç»„ä»¶æ›´æ–°ä¹‹åå†è·å–æœ€æ–°çš„ stateã€‚

                                                                              const [count, setCount] = useState(0)

const increment = () => {
  count // => 0
  setCount(count + 1)
  count // => 0
}

                                                                              æ³¨æ„

                                                                              åœ¨ä¸€æ¬¡äº‹ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¤šæ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œç›¸åŒçš„ setStateï¼Œå®ƒä»¬å°†ä¼šè¢«æ‰¹é‡å¤„ç†ï¼Œç„¶ååªè§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

                                                                              ä¸‹åˆ—ä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œå› ä¸º setCount æ˜¯å¼‚æ­¥çš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ¯æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ—¶å€™ count éƒ½ä¸º 0ã€‚å¹¶ä¸”ï¼Œè§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡ increment äº‹ä»¶ï¼Œåªä¼šæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ render å‡½æ•°ã€‚

                                                                              const [count, setCount] = useState(0)

const increment = () => {
  setCount(count + 1) // 0 + 1
  setCount(count + 1) // 0 + 1
  setCount(count + 1) // 0 + 1
}

                                                                              å¦‚æœè¦è§£å†³è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´æ–°å‡½æ•°ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œæ›´æ–°å‡½æ•°çš„è®¡ç®—ç»“æœä¼šä½œä¸ºä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ›´æ–°å‡½æ•°çš„çŠ¶æ€ä¼ å…¥ã€‚å½“ç„¶ï¼Œè¿™ç§å†™æ³•ä¹Ÿåªä¼šè§¦å‘ä¸€æ¬¡é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚

const increment = () => {
  setCount(count => count + 1) // 0 + 1
  setCount(count => count + 1) // 1 + 1
  setCount(count => count + 1) // 2 + 1
}

                                                                              # useEffect

                                                                              å½“ç»„ä»¶æ¸²æŸ“å®Œæˆåæˆ–å¸è½½æ—¶ï¼Œsetup å°±ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œ useEffect å‰æ‰§è¡Œ cleanupã€‚

                                                                              setup ä¼šåœ¨åˆå§‹æ¸²æŸ“å®Œæˆåæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ã€‚ç„¶åæ ¹æ®ä¾èµ–é¡¹ï¼Œå†³å®šæ˜¯å¦å†æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œï¼š

                                                                              • æ²¡æœ‰ä¾èµ–æ•°ç»„ï¼šç»„ä»¶æ¯æ¬¡é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œsetup éƒ½ä¼šå†æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œã€‚

                                                                              • ä¾èµ–æ•°ç»„æœ‰å€¼ï¼šå½“ä¾èµ–é¡¹å‘ç”Ÿæ›´æ–°çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼Œsetup æ‰ä¼šå†æ¬¡æ‰§è¡Œã€‚

                                                                              • ä¾èµ–æ•°ç»„ä¸ºç©ºï¼šsetup åªåœ¨åˆå§‹æ¸²æŸ“å®Œæˆåæ‰§è¡Œã€‚

                                                                              const [state, setState] = useState(0)

useEffect(() => /* setup */ {
  let timer = setTimeout(() => {
    // do something...
  }, 1000)
  
  return () => /* cleanup */ {
    clearTimeout(timer)
    timer = null
  }
}, [state])

                                                                              useEffect å¯ä»¥æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»„ä»¶çš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸã€‚

                                                                              // ç»„ä»¶æŒ‚è½½
const useMounted = (fn: () => void) => {
  useEffect(() => {
    fn()
  }, [])
}

// ç»„ä»¶å¸è½½
const useUnmounted = (fn: () => void) => {
  useEffect(() => {
    return fn
  }, [])
}

                                                                              æ³¨æ„

                                                                              å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹ï¼Œå¦‚æœå¼€å¯ä¸¥æ ¼æ¨¡å¼ï¼ŒuseEffect ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œä¸¤æ¬¡ï¼Œè¿™æ˜¯ä¸ºäº†æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç«‹å³å¸è½½ç»„ä»¶å’Œé‡æ–°æŒ‚è½½ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œæå‰æš´éœ²é—®é¢˜ã€‚

                                                                              # useRef

                                                                              å¼•ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼

                                                                              useRef å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªä¸éœ€è¦æ¸²æŸ“çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ ref.current å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®å®ƒçš„å€¼ã€‚ä¸ state ä¸åŒï¼Œref æ˜¯å¯å˜çš„ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å®ƒçš„æ”¹å˜ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘ç»„ä»¶é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚ref ä»…ä»…æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ™®é€šçš„ JavaScript å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                              æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ref å­˜å‚¨ä¸€ä¸ªå®šæ—¶å™¨ IDã€‚è¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥ç¡®ä¿ï¼š

                                                                              • åœ¨é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“æ—¶èƒ½å¤Ÿå­˜å‚¨æ•°æ®ï¼ˆå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨æ™®é€šå˜é‡å­˜å‚¨ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆæ¯æ¬¡é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“éƒ½ä¼šé‡ç½®ï¼‰ã€‚

                                                                              • å¦‚æœç»„ä»¶è¢«å¤šæ¬¡å¤ç”¨ï¼Œref çš„æ”¹å˜å¹¶ä¸ä¼šä½¿ä»–ä»¬ä¹‹é—´ç›¸äº’å½±å“ï¼Œå› ä¸º ref æ˜¯æ¯ä¸ªç»„ä»¶å†…éƒ¨ç‰¹æœ‰çš„ï¼ˆè€Œå¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨å¤–éƒ¨å˜é‡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®ƒå°±ä¼šæ˜¯å…±äº«çš„ï¼Œå®ƒçš„æ”¹å˜ä¼šä½¿å…¶ä»–å¤ç”¨çš„ç»„ä»¶å—åˆ°å½±å“ï¼‰ã€‚

                                                                              const timerRef = useRef(null)

timerRef.current = setInterval(() => {
  // do something...
}, 1000)

const stop = () => {
  clearInterval(timerRef.current)
}

                                                                              æ³¨æ„

                                                                              å› ä¸º ref çš„æ”¹å˜ä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘é‡æ–°æ¸²æŸ“ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥ä¸æ¨èå°†å®ƒåœ¨é¡µé¢ä¸­å±•ç¤ºã€‚å¦‚æœæœ‰éœ€è¦ï¼Œåº”è¯¥ä½¿ç”¨ state ä»£æ›¿ã€‚

                                                                              ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå®Œæ•´çš„è®¡æ—¶å™¨å€’è®¡æ—¶æ¡ˆä¾‹ã€‚

                                                                              const [count, setCount] = useState(10)
const countRef = useRef(count)

const timerRef = useRef(null)

const start = () => {
  timerRef.current = setInterval(() => {
    countRef.current--
    setCount(countRef.current)
    if (countRef.current === 0) stop()
  }, 1000)
}

const stop = () => {
  clearInterval(timerRef.current)
  timerRef.current = null
}

                                                                              æ“ä½œ DOM

                                                                              ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ª HTML å…ƒç´ æ³¨å†Œ refï¼Œå°±å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ ref.current è®¿é—®è¿™ä¸ª DOM å…ƒç´ ã€‚

                                                                              ä¸‹é¢çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡ ref è°ƒç”¨äº† <input> å…ƒç´ çš„ focus() æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

                                                                              const inputRef = useRef(null)

const focus = () => {
  inputRef.current.focus()
}

return <input ref={inputRef} />

                                                                              è·å–è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶çš„ ref

                                                                              å¦‚æœåƒè¿™æ ·ç»™è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶æ³¨å†Œ refï¼Œæ§åˆ¶å°å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°è¿™æ ·çš„é”™è¯¯ï¼š

                                                                              è­¦å‘Š

                                                                              Function components cannot be given refs. Attempts to access this ref will fail. Did you mean to use React.forwardRef()?

                                                                              è¯‘ï¼šä¸èƒ½ç»™å‡½æ•°ç»„ä»¶æä¾› refï¼Œä½ éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ React.forwardRef() å—ï¼Ÿ

                                                                              const inputRef = useRef(null)

return <MyInput ref={inputRef} />

                                                                              é»˜è®¤æƒ…å†µä¸‹ï¼Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶ä¸ä¼šæš´éœ²å®ƒä»¬å†…éƒ¨ DOM èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ refã€‚

                                                                              æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ forwardRef æ¥åŒ…è£…è‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±èƒ½å°†å®ƒçš„ ref æš´éœ²ç»™çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                              import { forwardRef } from "react"

// interface ForwardRefRenderFunction<T, P = {}> {
//   (props: P, ref: ForwardedRef<T>): ReactNode
// }

const MyInput = forwardRef<HTMLInputElement, any>((props, ref) => {
  return <input ref={ref} {...props} />
})

                                                                              é—­åŒ…é™·é˜±

                                                                              å½“å¼‚æ­¥å‡½æ•°è·å– state æ—¶ï¼Œå¯èƒ½è·å–çš„ä¸æ˜¯æœ€æ–°çš„ stateï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ useRef æ¥è§£å†³ã€‚

                                                                              å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œå…ˆç‚¹å‡»ä¸€æ¬¡æ‰“å°æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œå†è¿…é€Ÿç‚¹å‡»äº”æ¬¡ç´¯åŠ æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œæœ€ç»ˆç»“æœä¸º count: 5 countRef.current: 10ã€‚

                                                                              è¿™æ˜¯å› ä¸º count æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå€¼ï¼Œè€Œ countRef æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨ç±»å‹ã€‚

  countRef.current = count
}, [count])

// ç´¯åŠ

// æ‰“å°

  setTimeout(() => {
    count // => 5
    countRef.current // => 10
  }, 3000)

                                                                              # useContext

                                                                              useContext æ¥å—ä¸€ä¸ª context å¯¹è±¡ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œè¯¥å¯¹è±¡ç”± createContext åˆ›å»ºã€‚å¹¶è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå®ƒåŒ…å«äº† <Context.Provider> ç»„ä»¶æä¾›çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

                                                                              <Context.Provider> ç±»ä¼¼äº Vue Providerï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç»™åä»£ç»„ä»¶æä¾›æ•°æ®ã€‚

                                                                              const InputContext = createContext(null)

const [content, setContent] = useState("Hello React")

const inputModel = {
  value: content,
  onChange: (event: ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    setContent(event.target.value)
  }
}

return (
  <InputContext.Provider value={inputModel}>
    <Input />
  </InputContext.Provider>
)

                                                                              # useReducer

                                                                              useReducer å°±æ˜¯ç®€åŒ–ç‰ˆçš„ Reduxã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦åˆ¶å®šä¸€å¥—æ›´æ–° state çš„è§„åˆ™ï¼Œæ ¹æ®ä¸åŒäº‹ä»¶ç±»å‹ï¼Œåšå‡ºç›¸åº”å¤„ç†ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä¸Šè¿°æ“ä½œå®šä¹‰æˆä¸€ä¸ª reducer å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå®ƒæ¥å—ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼š

                                                                              • stateï¼šçŠ¶æ€ã€‚
                                                                              • actionï¼šå¿…é¡»æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ª type å±æ€§ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºäº‹ä»¶ç±»å‹ã€‚å¦‚æœæœ‰é¢å¤–çš„å‚æ•°ï¼Œé€šå¸¸å†™åœ¨ payload ä¸­ã€‚

                                                                              æœ€åï¼Œéœ€è¦å°†å¤„ç†åçš„æ•°æ®è¿”å›ã€‚

                                                                              useReducer éœ€è¦æ¥å—ä¸€ä¸ª reducer å‡½æ•°å’Œåˆå§‹çš„ stateã€‚å®ƒä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåªè¯»çš„ state å’Œ dispatch å‡½æ•°ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬åªèƒ½ä½¿ç”¨è¯¥å‡½æ•°æ¥ç»Ÿä¸€å¤„ç† stateï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯ç›´æ¥ä¿®æ”¹ã€‚

                                                                              const reducer = (state, { type, payload }) => {
  switch (type) {
    case "increment":
      return { ...state, count: state.count + payload.count }
    case "decrement":
      return { ...state, count: state.count - payload.count }
    default:
      return state
  }
}

const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, { count: 1 })

const increment = () => {
  dispatch({ type: "increment", payload: { count: 1 } })
}

const decrement = () => {
  dispatch({ type: "decrement", payload: { count: 1 } })
}

                                                                              ç®€å•å®ç°ä¸€ä¸‹ useReducerã€‚

                                                                              type Action<T = any> = {
  type: string
  payload?: T
}

function useReducer<T = any>(
  reducer: (state: T, action: Action<T>) => T,
  initialState: T
): [
  state: T,
  dispatch: (action: Action<T>) => void
] {
  const [state, setState] = useState(initialState)
  const dispatch = (action: Action<T>) => setState(reducer(state, action))
  
  return [state, dispatch]
}

                                                                              # useMemo

                                                                              useMemo ç±»ä¼¼äº Vue Computedï¼Œç”¨äºç¼“å­˜ä¸€ä¸ªè®¡ç®—ç»“æœï¼Œåªæœ‰å½“ä¾èµ–é¡¹å‘ç”Ÿæ”¹å˜æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰ä¼šé‡æ–°è®¡ç®—ã€‚

                                                                              const [count, setCount] = useState(1)

const double = useMemo(() => count * 2, [count]) // åªæœ‰å½“ count æ”¹å˜æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰ä¼šé‡æ–°è®¡ç®—

                                                                              # useCallback

const showCount = () => console.log(count)

const cachedShowCount = useCallback(showCount, [count]) // åªæœ‰å½“ count æ”¹å˜æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰ä¼šé‡æ–°åˆ›å»ºå‡½æ•°

                                                                              # HOC

                                                                              HOC å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ React çš„ APIï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯ä¸€ç§å®ç°é€»è¾‘å¤ç”¨çš„æŠ€æœ¯ã€‚HOC å…¶å®å°±å¯ä»¥çœ‹ä½œæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜é˜¶å‡½æ•°ï¼Œåªä¸è¿‡ React çš„ç»„ä»¶éƒ½æ˜¯ç”¨å‡½æ•°åˆ›å»ºçš„ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æˆ‘ä»¬æŠŠå®ƒç§°ä¸º â€œé«˜é˜¶ç»„ä»¶â€ã€‚

                                                                              é«˜é˜¶ç»„ä»¶æ¥å—ä¸€ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ç»„ä»¶ã€‚è¿™ä¸ªæ–°çš„ç»„ä»¶ä¼šå…·æœ‰é«˜é˜¶ç»„ä»¶çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

                                                                              withLog.tsx

                                                                              ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹ã€‚é€šè¿‡ useEffect æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç»„ä»¶æŒ‚è½½å’Œå¸è½½ï¼Œå¹¶æ‰“å°æ—¥å¿—ã€‚

                                                                              const withLog = (Component: FC<any>) => {
  return (props: any) => {
    useEffect(() => {
      console.log(`${Component.name} ç»„ä»¶å·²æŒ‚è½½ ${now()}`)
      
      return () => {
        console.log(`${Component.name} ç»„ä»¶å·²å¸è½½ ${now()}`)
      }
    }, [])
    
    return <Component {...props} />
  }
}
                                                                              *.tsx

                                                                              å°†ä»»æ„ç»„ä»¶ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ é€’ç»™é«˜é˜¶ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œä¼šè¿”å›çš„ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å®ƒå·²ç»å…·æœ‰äº†æ‰“å°æ—¥å¿—çš„åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚

  <h2>{title}</h2>
))

                                                                              # Diffing

                                                                              # ç®€å•ä»‹ç»

                                                                              • å½“æ•°æ®å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–æ—¶ï¼ŒReact ä¼šç”Ÿæˆæ–°çš„è™šæ‹Ÿ DOMï¼Œç„¶åå¯¹æ–°ç”Ÿæˆçš„è™šæ‹Ÿ DOM ä¸å½“å‰è™šæ‹Ÿ DOM è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼›

                                                                              • React é€šè¿‡æ¯”è¾ƒè¿™ä¸¤æ£µè™šæ‹Ÿ DOM æ ‘çš„å·®å¼‚ï¼Œå†³å®šå¦‚ä½•ä¿®æ”¹ DOM ç»“æ„ã€‚è¿™ç§ç®—æ³•ç§°ä¸º Diffing ç®—æ³•ï¼›

                                                                              • Diffing ç®—æ³•å¯ä»¥æå‡ React çš„æ¸²æŸ“æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å‡ºè™šæ‹Ÿ DOM ä¸­å˜åŒ–çš„éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œé’ˆå¯¹è¯¥éƒ¨åˆ†è¿›è¡Œ DOM æ“ä½œã€‚

                                                                              # ç®—æ³•ç­–ç•¥

                                                                              ç­–ç•¥ä¸€

                                                                              • ä¸¤æ£µæ ‘åªå¯¹åŒä¸€å±‚çº§çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œè‹¥è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨ï¼Œåˆ™è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹åŠæ‰€æœ‰å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å°†è¢«åˆ é™¤ï¼Œä¸å†è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼›

                                                                              • React Diffing åªè€ƒè™‘åŒå±‚çº§çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ä½ç½®å˜æ¢ï¼Œè‹¥ä¸ºè·¨å±‚çº§çš„ä½ç½®å˜æ¢ï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ºåˆ é™¤èŠ‚ç‚¹å’Œåˆ›å»ºèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼›

                                                                              # Key

                                                                              • å½“æŸä¸ªèŠ‚ç‚¹æ·»åŠ äº†åŒçº§èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸­å”¯ä¸€çš„ key å±æ€§ï¼Œå½“å®ƒåœ¨å½“å‰å±‚çº§çš„ä½ç½®å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–åï¼ŒDiffing ç®—æ³•é€šè¿‡æ¯”è¾ƒä¹‹åï¼Œå¦‚æœå‘ç°äº† key å€¼ç›¸åŒçš„æ–°æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°±ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œç§»åŠ¨æ“ä½œï¼Œè€Œä¸ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œåˆ é™¤æ—§èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸åˆ›å»ºæ–°èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ“ä½œï¼›

                                                                              • React å»ºè®®ä¸è¦ç”¨éå†æ—¶çš„ index ä½œä¸ºèŠ‚ç‚¹çš„ key å€¼ï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªå…ƒç´ çš„ index ä¼šéšç»“æ„çš„æ”¹å˜è€Œå‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ã€‚

                                                                              # Router

                                                                              # è·¯ç”±é…ç½®

                                                                              ä½¿ç”¨ <Routes> å’Œ <Route> çš„ç»„åˆå†™æ³•ã€‚

                                                                              import { BrowserRouter, Routes, Route, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"

const App = () => (
  <BrowserRouter>
    <Routes>
      <Route path="/" element={<Layout />}>
        <Route index element={<Navigate to="home" />} />
        <Route path="home" element={<Home />} />
        <Route path="about" element={<About />} />
        <Route path="*" element={<NotFound />} />
      </Route>
    </Routes>
  </BrowserRouter>
)

                                                                              v6 æä¾›äº† useRoutesï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Vue Router é£æ ¼çš„è·¯ç”±ã€‚

                                                                              import { BrowserRouter, useRoutes, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"

const App = () => (
  <BrowserRouter>
    <Router />
  </BrowserRouter>
)

// `useRoutes` may be used only in the context of a <Router> component.
const Router = () => {
  return useRoutes(routes)
}

const routes = [
  {
    path: "/",
    element: <Layout />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <Navigate to="home" />
      },
      {
        path: "home",
        element: <Home />
      },
      {
        path: "about",
        element: <About />
      },
      {
        path: "*",
        element: <NotFound />
      }
    ]
  }
]

                                                                              v6 æ¨èå°† <BrowserRouter> è¿ç§»åˆ° <RouterProvider> ã€‚

                                                                              import { RouterProvider, createBrowserRouter, Navigate } from "react-router-dom"

const App = () => {
  return <RouterProvider router={router} />
}

const router = createBrowserRouter(routes)

const routes = [
  {
    path: "/",
    element: <Layout />,
    children: [
      {
        index: true,
        element: <Navigate to="home" />
      },
      {
        path: "home",
        element: <Home />
      },
      {
        path: "about",
        element: <About />
      },
      {
        path: "*",
        element: <NotFound />
      }
    ]
  }
]

                                                                              å¦‚æœæ›´å–œæ¬¢ JSX é£æ ¼çš„è·¯ç”±ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ createRoutesFromElementsã€‚

                                                                              import {
  RouterProvider,
  createBrowserRouter,
  createRoutesFromElements,
  Route,
  Navigate
} from "react-router-dom"

const App = () => {
  return <RouterProvider router={router} />
}

const router = createBrowserRouter(createRoutesFromElements(
  <Route path="/" element={<Layout />}>
    <Route index element={<Navigate to="home" />} />
    <Route path="home" element={<Home />} />
    <Route path="about" element={<About />} />
    <Route path="*" element={<NotFound />} />
  </Route>
))

                                                                              # Link & NavLink

                                                                              <Link> æ˜¯ä¸€ç§å¯¼èˆªé“¾æ¥ï¼Œå½“ç”¨æˆ·ç‚¹å‡»æ—¶ä¼šè·³è½¬åˆ°å¦ä¸€ä¸ªé¡µé¢ã€‚

                                                                              <NavLink> æ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç‰¹æ®Šçš„ <Link>ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šç»™è·¯ç”±æä¾›ä¸‰ç§çŠ¶æ€ï¼šisActive æ¿€æ´»ã€isPending åŠ è½½ã€isTransitioning è¿‡æ¸¡ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®å®ƒä¸åŒçš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œè®¾ç½®å¯¹åº”çš„æ ·å¼ã€‚

  Home
</NavLink>

  About
</NavLink>

<Link to="/about">About</Link>

                                                                              # useNavigate

                                                                              useNavigate ä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ª navigate å‡½æ•°ï¼Œå®ƒæ˜¯ä¸€ç§ç¼–ç¨‹å¼çš„å¯¼èˆªã€‚

                                                                              navigate æ¥å—ä¸¤ä¸ªå‚æ•°ï¼š

                                                                              • ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•° to ä¸ <Link to> çš„ç±»å‹ç›¸åŒã€‚å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè·¯å¾„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæè¿°è·¯å¾„çš„å¯¹è±¡ã€‚

                                                                              • ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•° options ä¸ <Link props> ç›¸ä¼¼ã€‚å¸¸ç”¨çš„å±æ€§æœ‰ state replaceã€‚

                                                                              ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ navigate çš„ç±»å‹å£°æ˜ã€‚

                                                                              declare function useNavigate(): NavigateFunction

interface NavigateFunction {
  (to: To, options?: NavigateOptions): void
  (delta: number): void
}

type To = string | Partial<Path>

interface Path {
  /**
   * A URL pathname, beginning with a /.
   */
  pathname: string
  
  /**
   * A URL search string, beginning with a ?.
   */
  search: string
  
  /**
   * A URL fragment identifier, beginning with a #.
   */
  hash: string
}

interface NavigateOptions {
  replace?: boolean
  state?: any
  preventScrollReset?: boolean
  relative?: RelativeRoutingType
  unstable_flushSync?: boolean
  unstable_viewTransition?: boolean
}

                                                                              æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ useNavigate ä¼ é€’ä¸‰ç§è·¯ç”±å‚æ•°ï¼šsearch (query string)ã€paramsã€stateã€‚

                                                                              import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"

const navigate = useNavigate()

// ä¼ é€’ search å‚æ•°
navigate({ pathname: "/user", search: "?id=1&name=minji" })

// ä¼ é€’ params å‚æ•°ï¼Œéœ€è¦è®¾ç½®åŠ¨æ€è·¯å¾„
navigate("/user/1/minji") // <Route path="user/:id/:name" />

// ä¼ é€’ state å‚æ•°
navigate("/user", { state: { id: 1, name: "minji" } })

                                                                              # search

                                                                              import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"
import qs from "query-string"

const location = useLocation()

location.search // ?id=1&name=minji
qs.parse(location.search) // { id: '1', name: 'minji' }

                                                                              # è·¯ç”±æ‡’åŠ è½½

                                                                              <Suspense> ç”¨äºåœ¨åŠ è½½è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ä¸´æ—¶æ›¿æ¢ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œç”¨ fallback æŒ‡å®šè¢«æ›¿æ¢çš„ç»„ä»¶ã€‚

                                                                              import { type FC, Suspense, lazy } from "react"
import { createBrowserRouter, createRoutesFromElements, Route } from "react-router-dom"

const load = (Component: FC) => (
  <Suspense fallback={<Loading />}>
    <Component />
  </Suspense>
)

const router = createBrowserRouter(createRoutesFromElements(
  <Route path="/" element={<Layout />}>
    <Route path="home" element={load(lazy(() => import("@/pages/home.tsx")))} />
    <Route path="about" element={load(lazy(() => import("@/pages/about.tsx")))} />
  </Route>
))

                                                                              # Redux Toolkit

                                                                              # åˆ›å»º Store

                                                                              slice/counter.ts

                                                                              ä½¿ç”¨ createSlice åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ª sliceã€‚

                                                                              import { createSlice, type PayloadAction } from "@reduxjs/toolkit"

type CounterState = {
  value: number
}

type CounterAction = PayloadAction<CounterState>

const initialState: CounterState = {
  value: 0
}

const counterSlice = createSlice({
  name: "counter",
  initialState,
  reducers: {
    increment(state, { payload }: CounterAction) {
      state.value += payload.value
    },
    decrement(state, { payload }: CounterAction) {
      state.value -= payload.value
    }
  }
})

export const { increment, decrement } = counterSlice.actions

export default counterSlice.reducer
                                                                              store.ts

                                                                              ä¸€ä¸ª store ä¸­å¯èƒ½ä¼šæœ‰å¤šä¸ª sliceï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥éœ€è¦æ•´åˆæ‰€æœ‰ sliceï¼Œé›†ä¸­ç®¡ç†æ•°æ®ã€‚

                                                                              import { configureStore } from "@reduxjs/toolkit"
import counterReducer from "./slice/counter"

const store = configureStore({
  reducer: {
    counter: counterReducer,
  }
})

// è®¢é˜… store çš„æ›´æ–°
store.subscribe(() => console.log(store.getState()))

// æ¨å¯¼ state çš„ç±»å‹
export type RootState = ReturnType<typeof store.getState>

// æ¨å¯¼ action çš„ç±»å‹
export type AppDispatch = typeof store.dispatch

export default store

                                                                              # åœ¨ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨

                                                                              import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"
import type { RootState, AppDispatch } from "@/store"
import { increment, decrement } from "@/store/slice/counter"

const counterState = useSelector((state: RootState) => state.counter)

const dispatch: AppDispatch = useDispatch()

const increase = () => {
  dispatch(increment({ value: 1 }))
}

const decrease = () => {
  dispatch(decrement({ value: 1 }))
}

                                                                              ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ useSelector å’Œ useDispatch ä¼šå¯¼è‡´æ¯æ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨ Store éƒ½éœ€è¦å¼•å…¥ç±»å‹ï¼Œå†™å¾ˆå¤šé‡å¤çš„ä»£ç ã€‚

                                                                              æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»º â€œé¢„è¾“å…¥â€ çš„ hooksï¼Œè®©å®ƒä»¬åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨å‰å°±å·²ç»å…·æœ‰ç±»å‹ã€‚

                                                                              import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"
import type { RootState, AppDispatch } from "@/store"

export const useAppSelector = useSelector.withTypes<RootState>()
export const useAppDispatch = useDispatch.withTypes<AppDispatch>()

                                                                              åœ¨ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„ hooksï¼Œå°±ä¸éœ€è¦å†å…³æ³¨ç±»å‹äº†ã€‚

                                                                              import { useAppSelector, useAppDispatch } from "@/store/hooks"

const counterState = useAppSelector(state => state.counter) // { value: 0 }

const dispatch = useAppDispatch()

                                                                              # å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œ

                                                                              slice/user.ts
                                                                              import { createSlice, createAsyncThunk, type PayloadAction } from "@reduxjs/toolkit"
import type { LoginParams } from "@/api/user"

type UserState = {
  token: string
  userInfo: {
    id: number
    name: string
  }
}

type LoginAction = PayloadAction<Pick<UserState, "token">>

type UserInfoAction = PayloadAction<Pick<UserState, "userInfo">>

const initialState: UserState = {
  token: "",
  userInfo: null
}

export const fetchLogin = createAsyncThunk("fetchLogin", async (data: LoginParams) => {
  const response = await (await fetch("/api/login", {
    method: "post",
    body: JSON.stringify(data),
    headers: {
      "Content-Type": "application/json"
    }
  })).json()
  return response.data // response.data => { "token": "rhcvbzsdrhtgmner" }
})

export const fetchUserInfo = createAsyncThunk("fetchUserInfo", async () => {
  const response = await (await fetch("/api/user")).json()
  return { userInfo: response.data } // response.data => { "id": 1, "name": "minji" }
})

const userSlice = createSlice({
  name: "user",
  initialState,
  reducers: {},
  extraReducers(builder) {
    builder
      .addCase(fetchLogin.fulfilled, (state, { payload }: LoginAction) => {
        state.token = payload.token
      })
      .addCase(fetchLogin.rejected, () => {
        console.log("login rejected")
      })
      
      .addCase(fetchUserInfo.fulfilled, (state, { payload }: UserInfoAction) => {
        state.userInfo = payload.userInfo
      })
      .addCase(fetchUserInfo.pending, () => {
        console.log("userInfo pending")
      })
  }
})

export default userSlice.reducer

                                                                              # Zustand

                                                                              # åˆ›å»º Store

                                                                              ç›¸æ¯”äº Reduxï¼ŒZustand åœ¨ store ä¸­æ·»åŠ  actions éå¸¸ç®€å•ã€‚

                                                                              import { create } from "zustand"

type CounterState = {
  count: number
}

type CounterAction = {
  increment: () => void
  decrement: () => void
  update: (value: number) => void
  reset: () => void
}

const useCounterStore = create<CounterState & CounterAction>(set => ({
  count: 0,
  increment: () => {
    set(state => ({ count: state.count + 1 }))
  },
  decrement: () => {
    set(state => ({ count: state.count - 1 }))
  },
  update: value => {
    set({ count: value })
  },
  reset: () => {
    set({ count: 0 })
  }
}))

                                                                              # åœ¨ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨

                                                                              Zustand ä¸ Pinia éå¸¸ç›¸ä¼¼ï¼Œåªéœ€è¦æŠŠ state å’Œ actions è§£æ„å‡ºæ¥å°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨äº†ã€‚

                                                                              import useCounterStore from "@/store/counterStore"

const { count, increment, decrement, update, reset } = useCounterStore()

const random = Math.ceil(Math.random() * 100)

return <>
  <button onClick={increment}>increment</button>
  <button onClick={decrement}>decrement</button>
  <button onClick={() => update(random)}>update</button>
  <button onClick={reset}>reset</button>
</>

                                                                              # å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œ

                                                                              Zustand å¤„ç†å¼‚æ­¥æ“ä½œä¸éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œç‰¹æ®Šå¤„ç†ï¼Œä¸åŒæ­¥æ“ä½œæ²¡æœ‰åŒºåˆ«ã€‚

                                                                              import { create } from "zustand"

interface LoginParams {
  username: string
  password: number
}

type UserState = {
  token: string
  userInfo: { id: number, name: string }
}

type UserAction = {
  fetchLogin: (data: LoginParams) => void
  fetchUserInfo: () => void
}

const useUserStore = create<UserState & UserAction>(set => ({
  userInfo: null,
  token: "",
  fetchLogin: async data => {
    const response = await (await fetch("/api/login", {
      method: "post",
      body: JSON.stringify(data),
      headers: {
        "Content-Type": "application/json"
      }
    })).json()
    set({ token: response.data.token })
  },
  fetchUserInfo: async () => {
    const response = await (await fetch("/api/user")).json()
    set({ userInfo: response.data })
  }
}))

                                                                              åœ¨ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ä¾ç„¶æ˜¯è§£æ„ä¹‹åå°±å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚

                                                                              import useUserStore from "@/store/userStore"

const { token, userInfo, fetchLogin, fetchUserInfo } = useUserStore()

const login = () => fetchLogin({
  username: "root",
  password: 1234
})

return <>
  <button onClick={login}>login</button>
  <button onClick={fetchUserInfo}>user</button>
</>

                                                                              # åˆ‡ç‰‡æ¨¡å¼

                                                                              ä¸Šé¢çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸¤ä¸ª storeï¼Œå®ƒä»¬æ˜¯ç‹¬ç«‹çš„ã€‚ç°åœ¨æˆ‘ä»¬å°†å…¶æ•´åˆæˆä¸€ä¸ª storeï¼Œå¹¶ä»¥åˆ‡ç‰‡çš„å½¢å¼æ‹†åˆ†ã€‚

                                                                              import { create, type StateCreator } from "zustand"

type CounterSlice = {
  count: number
  increment: () => void
  decrement: () => void
  update: (value: number) => void
  reset: () => void
}

const createCounterStore: StateCreator<CounterSlice> = set => ({
  count: 0,
  increment: () => {/* do something... */},
  decrement: () => {/* do something... */},
  update: value => {/* do something... */},
  reset: () => {/* do something... */}
})

type UserSlice = {
  token: string
  userInfo: { id: number, name: string }
  fetchLogin: (data: LoginParams) => void
  fetchUserInfo: () => void
}

const createUserStore: StateCreator<UserSlice> = set => ({
  userInfo: null,
  token: "",
  fetchLogin: async data => {/* do something... */},
  fetchUserInfo: async () => {/* do something... */}
})

const useStore = create<CounterSlice & UserSlice>((...args) => ({
  ...createCounterStore(...args),
  ...createUserStore(...args)
}))

                                                                              # CSS è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆ

                                                                              # CSS Modules

                                                                              ä½¿ç”¨ Sass å®šä¹‰æ ·å¼ã€‚æ³¨æ„ï¼šåç¼€åå¿…é¡»ä¸º *.module.cssã€‚

                                                                              /* layout.module.scss */

.menu {
  width: 240px;
  height: 100%;
  background: #344156;
  
  .menu-item {
    width: 100%;
    height: 80px;
    line-height: 80px;
    background: #222d3d;
    color: #c1cbd9;
    text-align: center;
    cursor: pointer;
    
    &:hover {
      background: #051528;
    }
  }
  
  .active {
    .menu-item {
      background-color: #051528;
    }
  }
}

                                                                              ä½¿ç”¨ classnames + CSS Modules åœ¨ React ä¸­ä¼˜é›…åœ°å¼•å…¥ CSSã€‚

                                                                              /* layout.tsx */

import classNames from "classnames"
import styles from "./layout.module.scss"

type NavLinkRenderProps = {
  isActive: boolean
  isPending: boolean
  isTransitioning: boolean
}

const menuClassName = classNames(styles["menu"])
const menuItemClassName = classNames(styles["menu-item"])
const activeClassName = ({ isActive }: NavLinkRenderProps) => classNames({
  [styles["active"]]: isActive
})

return <div className={menuClassName}>
  {routes.map(route => (
    <NavLink
      to={route.path}
      key={route.path}
      className={activeClassName}
    >
      <div className={menuItemClassName}>
        {route.path}
      </div>
    </NavLink>
  ))}
</div>

                                                                              # CSS in JS

                                                                              ä½¿ç”¨ styled components å®šä¹‰æ ·å¼ï¼Œå®ƒä¼šè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªç»„ä»¶å·²ç»åŒ…å«äº†æˆ‘ä»¬å®šä¹‰çš„æ ·å¼ã€‚

                                                                              è¯¦è§ styled-componentsopen in new windowã€‚

                                                                              import styled, { css } from "styled-components"

type ButtonProps = {
  $primary?: boolean;
}

const Button = styled.button<ButtonProps>`
  margin: 0.5em 1em;
  padding: 0.25em 1em;
  background: transparent;
  color: #bf4f74;
  border-radius: 3px;
  border: 2px solid #bf4f74;
  cursor: pointer;
  
  ${props => props.$primary && css`
    background: #bf4f74;
    color: white;
  `}
`

const ButtonGroup = styled.div`
  text-align: center;
`

return (
  <ButtonGroup>
    <Button>Normal Button</Button>
    <Button $primary>Primary Button</Button>
  </ButtonGroup>
)

                                                                              æˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä¸Šé¢ CSS in JS çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹è¿›è¡Œé‡å†™ã€‚

  <button
    className="mx-[1em] my-[0.5em] px-[1em] py-[0.25em] rounded-[3px] bg-transparent text-[#bf4f74]
      border-[2px] border-solid border-[#bf4f74]"

    Normal Button
  </button>

    className="mx-[1em] my-[0.5em] px-[1em] py-[0.25em] rounded-[3px] bg-[#bf4f74] text-white
      border-[2px] border-solid border-[#bf4f74]"
  >
    Primary Button
  </button>
</div>

                                                                              # UnoCSS

                                                                              UnoCSS åŸºäº Tailwindï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å®ƒæ›´åŠ å¼ºå¤§ã€‚

                                                                              å½“ç„¶ï¼Œå¦‚æœéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ä¸€äº›æ‰©å±•çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¹Ÿæ˜¯éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œé…ç½®çš„ã€‚

                                                                              /* uno.config.ts */

import {
  defineConfig,
  presetUno,
  presetAttributify,
  presetTagify,
  transformerDirectives
} from "unocss"

export default defineConfig({
  shortcuts: [
    { "flex-center": "flex justify-center items-center" },
    { pointer: "cursor-pointer" }
  ],
  rules: [
    [/^m-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ margin: `${num}px` })],
    [/^mx-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ "margin-left": `${num}px`, "margin-right": `${num}px` })],
    [/^my-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ "margin-top": `${num}px`, "margin-bottom": `${num}px` })],
    [/^p-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ padding: `${num}px` })],
    [/^px-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ "padding-left": `${num}px`, "padding-right": `${num}px` })],
    [/^py-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ "padding-top": `${num}px`, "padding-bottom": `${num}px` })],
    [/^rounded-([.\d]+)$/, ([_, num]) => ({ "border-radius": `${num}px` })]
    // ...
  ],
  presets: [
    presetUno(), // default
    presetAttributify(), // class to prop
    presetTagify({
      // prefix: "un-"
    })
  ],
  transformers: [
    transformerDirectives() // @apply
  ]
})

                                                                              å†æ¬¡å¯¹ä¸Šé¢çš„æ¡ˆä¾‹è¿›è¡Œé‡å†™ã€‚

                                                                              <div className="text-center">
  <button
    m="x-1em y-0.5em"
    p="x-1em y-0.25em"
    border="2px solid #bf4f74"
    className="rounded-3 bg-transparent text-#bf4f74"
  >
    Normal Button
  </button>
  <button
    m="x-1em y-0.5em"
    p="x-1em y-0.25em"
    border="2px solid #bf4f74"
    className="rounded-3 bg-#bf4f74 text-white"
  >
    Primary Button
  </button>
</div>

                                                                              ä¸éš¾çœ‹å‡ºï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¯¹ CSS è¿›è¡Œ â€œåˆ†ç±»â€ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ä½¿ç”¨å¤åˆå±æ€§ä¹Ÿå˜å¾—ç®€å•äº†ã€‚

                                                                              ä½†æ˜¯ä»ç„¶æœ‰å¤§é‡é‡å¤çš„æ ·å¼ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬éœ€è¦è¿›è¡ŒæŠ½ç¦»ä¸å¤ç”¨ï¼Œ@apply æŒ‡ä»¤å¯ä»¥å¸®åŠ©æˆ‘ä»¬å®Œæˆè¿™ä¸€ç‚¹ã€‚

                                                                              .custom {
  @apply mx-1em my-0.5em px-1em py-0.25em border-2 border-solid border-#bf4f74 rounded-3;
}

.normal {
  @apply bg-transparent text-#bf4f74;
}

.primary {
  @apply bg-#bf4f74 text-white;
}

                                                                              <div className="text-center">
  <button className="custom normal">
    Normal Button
  </button>
  <button className="custom primary">
    Primary Button
  </button>
</div>

                                                                              è¿™æ ·ä¼¼ä¹åˆå›åˆ°äº†æœ€åŸå§‹çš„å†™æ³•ï¼Œåœ¨ CSS æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å®šä¹‰æ ·å¼ï¼Œç„¶åä½¿ç”¨ç±»åã€‚

                                                                              ä½†æ˜¯å®ƒä»¬æ˜¯ä¸ä¸€æ ·çš„ã€‚å¦‚æœæœ‰å¾ˆå¤šç›¸åŒçš„æ ·å¼ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ä¼ ç»Ÿçš„å†™æ³•ä¼šäº§ç”Ÿå¤§é‡é‡å¤çš„ CSS ä»£ç ï¼›è€Œä½¿ç”¨ @apply çš„å¥½å¤„æ˜¯ï¼Œå®ƒåªä¼šç”Ÿæˆä¸€æ¬¡ä»£ç ï¼Œç„¶åè¿›è¡Œå¤šæ¬¡å¤ç”¨ã€‚è¿™æ ·å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸€å®šç¨‹åº¦ä¸Šå‡å°æ–‡ä»¶çš„ä½“ç§¯ã€‚
